https://tmrev.io/movie/943967-Baian Fujieda the Assassin 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4ojkzWLJekyIRQzfYbY0Xv1I3HX.jpg An adaptation of the Shotaro Ikenami novels, set in the historical Edo period, and centered on Fujieda Bayan, a medicine man and doctor by day, but ruthless killer for hire by night. His tools of the trade are the same in either job: acupuncture needles that leave no trace. Baian Fujieda the Assassin
